020
021import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
022import net.tnemc.core.region.mode.BiomeMode;
023import net.tnemc.core.region.mode.WorldMode;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
025import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
026
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.HashMap;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.Optional;
032
033/**
034 * A class that contains information related to regions such as configs, and region-sharing naming.
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.1.2.0
038 */
039public class RegionProvider {
040
041  private final Map<String, String> sharing = new HashMap<>();
042  private final Map<String, RegionGroup> regions = new HashMap<>();
043
044  private final Map<String, RegionMode> modes = new HashMap<>();
045  private final List<String> disabledRegions = new ArrayList<>();
046
047  private boolean realmSharing;
048
049  private RegionMode mode;
050
051  public RegionProvider(final boolean realmSharing, final String mode) {
052
053    this.realmSharing = realmSharing;
054
055    //add modes
056    modes.put("biome", new BiomeMode());
057    modes.put("world", new WorldMode());
058
059    disabledRegions.addAll(MainConfig.yaml().getStringList("Core.Region.DisabledRegions"));
060
061    //set mode
062    this.mode = modes.getOrDefault(mode, modes.get("world"));
063  }
064
065  public void initializeRegion(final String name, final RegionType type) {
066
067    if(this.mode.accepted().contains(type)) {
068
069      if(type.equals(RegionType.WORLD) && MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Region.GroupRealms", true)) {
070
071        //Group the realms with this world.
072        if(!name.contains("_nether") && !name.contains("_the_end")) {
073          sharing.put(name + "_nether", name);
074          sharing.put(name + "_the_end", name);
075        } else {
076
077          //This is the nether or end, so we don't need to go through the sharing fiasco below.
078          sharing.put(name, name.split("_")[0]);
079          return;
080        }
081      }
082
083      if(MainConfig.yaml().contains("Core.Region.Sharing." + name)) {
084        sharing.put(name, MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Region.Sharing." + name));
085      }
086    }
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Used to add a region group to our existing map of groups.
091   *
092   * @param name  The name of the group
093   * @param group The group instance.
094   */
095  public void addGroup(final String name, final RegionGroup group) {
096
097    regions.put(name, group);
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Used to find a region group based on its name.
102   *
103   * @param name The name of the group to find.
104   *
105   * @return An optional containing the {@link RegionGroup} if it exists, otherwise an empty
106   * optional.
107   */
108  public Optional<RegionGroup> retrieve(final String name) {
109
110    return Optional.ofNullable(regions.get(name));
111  }
112
113  public boolean multiRegion() {
114
115    return MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Region.MultiRegion");
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Used to resolve the region name to its connection or itself if no connection exists.
120   *
121   * @param region The region to get the true name, with connection if possible.
122   *
123   * @return The region name if no connection, otherwise the name of the connection.
124   */
125  @NotNull
126  public String resolve(final String region) {
127
128    if(disabledRegions.contains(region)) {
129      return region;
130    }
131
132    if(!MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Region.MultiRegion")) {
133      return defaultRegion();
134    }
135
136    return sharing.getOrDefault(region, defaultRegion());
137  }
138
139  public String defaultRegion() {
140
141    final String configDefault = MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Region.DefaultRegion");
142    if(configDefault.equalsIgnoreCase("TNE_SYSTEM")) {
143      return PluginCore.server().defaultWorld();
144    }
145    return configDefault;
146  }
147
148  public boolean isSharing() {
149
150    return realmSharing;
151  }
152
153  public void setRealmSharing(final boolean realmSharing) {
154
155    this.realmSharing = realmSharing;
156  }
157
158  public RegionMode getMode() {
159
160    return mode;
161  }
162
163  public void setMode(final String mode) {
164
165    this.mode = modes.getOrDefault(mode, modes.get("world"));
166  }
167
168  public Map<String, RegionGroup> getRegions() {
169
170    return regions;
171  }
172
173  public List<String> getDisabledRegions() {
174
175    return disabledRegions;
176  }
177}
